localResource.name: active
localResource.label: active
localResource.queryString:
-- This query will return for the "active_hosts_select" parameter the -- "Yes" and "No" options localized according to the session language -- in the input control display list and return the corresponding value to -- the report query
SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE ( enum_translator_localized.value_localized, enum_translator_default.value ) AS display, 'AND delete_date IS NULL' AS value FROM enum_translator AS enum_translator_default LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT enum_type, enum_key, value AS value_localized FROM enum_translator WHERE language_code = $P{userlocale} ) AS enum_translator_localized ON ( enum_translator_localized.enum_type = enum_translator_default.enum_type AND enum_translator_localized.enum_key = enum_translator_default.enum_key ) WHERE language_code = 'en_US' AND enum_translator_default.enum_key = 0 AND enum_translator_default.enum_type = 'REPORTS_SHOW_DELETED'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE ( enum_translator_localized.value_localized, enum_translator_default.value ) AS display, '' AS value FROM enum_translator AS enum_translator_default LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT enum_type, enum_key, value AS value_localized FROM enum_translator WHERE language_code = $P{userlocale} ) AS enum_translator_localized ON ( enum_translator_localized.enum_type = enum_translator_default.enum_type AND enum_translator_localized.enum_key = enum_translator_default.enum_key ) WHERE language_code = 'en_US' AND enum_translator_default.enum_key = 1 AND enum_translator_default.enum_type = 'REPORTS_SHOW_DELETED'
